title: How did the Ottomans run their government? - Quora

response.answer_text: It was an absolute monarchy until the late 19th century, then it was a constitutional monarchy until it collapsed in 1920. One interesting feature of the Ottoman Empire was the millet system, which allowed Muslim, Jewish, and Christian communities to rule themselves according to their own doctrinal laws. So long as you kept up with your taxes, of course.
